body_html:
Thanks for the contribution!

I think adding more booleans flags to the adam code is a little sad. How do you feel about making this a separate optimizer (sharing the op kernel is ok) in tensorflow/contrib/opt?
body_text:
Thanks for the contribution!
I think adding more booleans flags to the adam code is a little sad. How do you feel about making this a separate optimizer (sharing the op kernel is ok) in tensorflow/contrib/opt?
body:
Thanks for the contribution!

I think adding more booleans flags to the adam code is a little sad. How do you feel about making this a separate optimizer (sharing the op kernel is ok) in tensorflow/contrib/opt?
